keyword: how many calories in a clementine orange
title: How Many Calories in a Clementine Orange?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a clementine orange, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick nutrition tweaks for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Clementine Orange?
assumptions: Average medium clementine (~74 g edible portion), fresh, peeled, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics when available.

quick_answer.text: A single clementine orange provides about 35 kcal and 1.7 g of fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: In a smoothie with 100 ml yogurt

faqs.q: How many calories in one clementine orange?
faqs.a: Approximately 35 kcal for a medium clementine.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a clementine orange?
faqs.a: About 8.9 g total carbs, including 1.7 g fiber and 7.3 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a clementine orange low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2 g fat per clementine, with no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: How does clementine compare to other oranges?
faqs.a: Clementines are smaller and sweeter; a navel orange (130 g) has ~62 kcal.

faqs.q: Are clementines good for fiber intake?
faqs.a: Yes, one provides 1.7 g fiber, aiding digestion and satiety.
